## Source: ossf-package-analysis (c846f6c307a90dd9e7c0b57cb3c04387a7eb559452bc9ca3a536e926070c37de)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'triple-equals' @ 10.0.1 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
